name: Help Uncle Lee!
description:
Quick! Uncle Lee needs to get to the hospital but he's short on cash! Help him collect aluminum cans for money ($27), but watch out for the onion & garlic!!

You only have 45 seconds - can you make it in time?

Using Left and Right Arrows to control Uncle Lee.

-----

I created a game that takes place in Hong Kong because I miss the city.
In the reality, there are elderly people who have to sell cans to make a living too.
